ModMetaData.name: Milkwater's Pipe Gun Mod
ModMetaData.author: Milkwater
ModMetaData.description:
Adds 4 new pipe guns to your game.

Pipe guns are identical to their normal counterparts, but they are cheaper and have a 15% chance to jam, ending their burst early.

Raiders will use them sometimes and you can craft them by going through the normal research tree.

v1.1 Added a pipe shotgun.
